name: Chubby Bunny (Nosic)
description: A simple game made with Unity engine. Game is 2D platform, and its about chubby bunny who collects items for babies...like baby bottle, car warmer bottle, shirts and other things, also avoiding monsters. If you like design and play walkthrough, please donate or just buy it for 2$. It will make my day, and motivate me to do more games with better design, gameplay and more stuffs.
